PathOfBuilding.Notes:
^x70FF70Crafting ^7 ^xE05030(Disclaimer I am not some crazy gigabrain crafter I crafted these based off of what i thought would work and they did, there might be better ways to craft these items more efficiently)^7
^xD02090Helmet^7^xD02090: ^7Essence of Loathing until good life and 1 res roll you dont need the focus mod but its a nice damage increase if you can get it. (i didnt use it but its a 3mill dps increase)
^xD02090Shiel^xD02090d^7^xD02090:^7^7 Reforge Defense on harvest until t1 physical damage reduction and t1 spell suppression (needs to be ilvl 86 for t1 pdr but can go for t2) Once you have both suffixes craft suffixes cannot be changed and reforge life until you get a good life roll (you will have to annul if you dont have an open prefix and dont hit a good life mod)
^xD02090Chest:^7 Reforge Defense on harvest until t1 physical damage reduction and t1 spell suppression (needs to be ilvl 86 for t1 pdr but can go for t2) Once you have both you can either do the same step and reforge life (what I did) or the better way would be to use eldrich chaos or exalts just make sure Searing Exarch is Dominant (AKA has a higher implicit IE Grand with Eater being Lesser) You have two options go for a big life roll or if you get a big % and flat armour and evasion roll you can take the 15% increased life mastery if you dont have a life mod on your chest
^xD02090Amulet:^7 Reforge life until t1 DoT and a good life roll
^xD02090Ring:^7 Reforge Chaos until a T1 Ele res and a good Chaos res with decent life
^xD02090Belt:^7 Reforge Chaos until a T1 Ele res and a good Chaos res with decent life
^xD02090Clusters:^7 Reforge Chaos and pray (could also just buy them)
^x70FF70^xE05030Resistance can be an issue if you dont get lucky feel free to drop chaos res if needed or get res on jewels, make sure that your purity of elements has quality on it^7^7
